text:
I tryed to rednder to PDF with several embeded fonts, using font subset 
embeddind feature. According to messages during rendering and properties/fonts 
dialog in Acrobat reader it seem that all fonts are embeded, but some of them 
are not displayed. With older version which embeds all fonts (not only subsets) 
all fonts are displayed. Atthached package includes: used fonts and their 
metrics, userconfig.xml defining font embedding, test.pdf and test.png showing 
problems described above, testo.pdf and testo.png showing work with older 
version without subset embedding which seems to be okay and test.fo, the source 
document. All these happened using java 1.3.0_01, acrobat reader 4.05c CE and 
cvs snapshots of fop from 2001-03-19 (version without subsets) and 2001-03-23 
snapsot (version with font subsets)
creator: pand6029@artax.karlin.mff.cuni.cz
